name: Let's Go Bike Shirt
description:
I'm very excited to announce that i will be hosting a preorder sale of my Let's Go tee! This preorder will last 2 weeks and start today and end on the 8th of August. the shirts will be $20 dollars each and be printed by the awesome dudes at Vahalla Studios on Tultex triblend grey shirts (recommended by them).

send paypal to letsgocouchman@gmail.com. if you want to send a personal check, send me an email.

again, this is just a preorder so please allow time for the preorder to end, time for the shirts to me made, and time for shipping. the estimated date to ship the orders out is by the 17th of august. WILL ship INTERNATIONALLY however, the shipping will be more and sent through priority mail. there will NOT be insurance on the package so if you're buying from overseas, buy at your own risk. thanks! hope you guys like it!
